subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Thomas Voeckler won the 16th stage of the Tour de France over four huge climbs in the Pyrenees, while the defending champion, Cadel Evans, dropped out of title contention Wednesday.
snippet: Thomas Voeckler won the 16th stage of the Tour de France over four huge climbs in the Pyrenees, while the defending champion, Cadel Evans, dropped out of title contention Wednesday.
